destination.name: Bangkok
destination.funfact: Bangkok is known as the 'City of Angels' in Thai.

destination.name: Tokyo
destination.funfact: Tokyo has the busiest train station in the world: Shinjuku Station.

destination.name: Paris
destination.funfact: The Eiffel Tower was originally meant to be a temporary structure.

destination.name: New York
destination.funfact: Times Square was once called Longacre Square until 1904.

destination.name: Sydney
destination.funfact: Sydney Opera House took 14 years to build.

destination.name: Cairo
destination.funfact: Cairo is home to the only surviving ancient wonder: The Great Pyramid of Giza.
